name: 皮罗斯马尼主题上的蔓藤
summary: Arabeskebi Pirosmanis temaze (Arabesques on the Pirosmani Theme) (1985), 25mins A short mediation on the work of Georgian painter Niko Pirosmaniszvili (1862-1918). Sergei Paradjanov was born in Tblisi, Georgia (former Soviet Union) in 1924.
